card.name: Absolver Thrull
card.text: Haunt When Absolver Thrull enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Abyssal Nocturnus
card.text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Abyssal Nocturnus gets +2/+2 and gains fear until end of turn.

card.name: AEtherplasm
card.text: Whenever AEtherplasm blocks a creature, you may return AEtherplasm to its owner's hand. If you do, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield blocking that creature.

card.name: Agent of Masks
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Angel of Despair
card.text: Flying When Angel of Despair enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent.

card.name: Battering Wurm
card.text: Bloodthirst 1 Creatures with power less than Battering Wurm's power can't block it.

card.name: Beastmaster's Magemark
card.text: Enchant creature Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1. Whenever a creature you control that's enchanted becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

card.name: Belfry Spirit
card.text: Flying Haunt When Belfry Spirit enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, put two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Benediction of Moons
card.text: You gain 1 life for each player. Haunt When the creature Benediction of Moons haunts dies, you gain 1 life for each player.

card.name: Bioplasm
card.text: Whenever Bioplasm attacks, exile the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, Bioplasm gets +X/+Y until end of turn, where X is the exiled creature card's power and Y is its toughness.

card.name: Blind Hunter
card.text: Flying Haunt When Blind Hunter enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Bloodscale Prowler
card.text: Bloodthirst 1

card.name: Borborygmos
card.text: Trample Whenever Borborygmos deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Burning-Tree Bloodscale
card.text: Bloodthirst 1 {2}{R}: Target creature can't block Burning-Tree Bloodscale this turn. {2}{G}: Target creature blocks Burning-Tree Bloodscale this turn if able.

card.name: Burning-Tree Shaman
card.text: Whenever a player activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Burning-Tree Shaman deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Castigate
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.

card.name: Caustic Rain
card.text: Exile target land.

card.name: Cerebral Vortex
card.text: Target player draws two cards, then Cerebral Vortex deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards he or she has drawn this turn.

card.name: Conjurer's Ban
card.text: Name a card. Until your next turn, the named card can't be played. Draw a card.

card.name: Crash Landing
card.text: Target creature with flying loses flying until end of turn. Crash Landing deals damage to that creature equal to the number of Forests you control.

card.name: Cremate
card.text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: Cry of Contrition
card.text: Target player discards a card. Haunt When the creature Cry of Contrition haunts dies, target player discards a card.

card.name: Cryptwailing
card.text: {1}, Exile two creature cards from your graveyard: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Crystal Seer
card.text: When Crystal Seer enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order. {4}{U}: Return Crystal Seer to its owner's hand.

card.name: Culling Sun
card.text: Destroy each creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

card.name: Daggerclaw Imp
card.text: Flying Daggerclaw Imp can't block.

card.name: Debtors' Knell
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Djinn Illuminatus
card.text: Flying Each instant and sorcery spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost.

card.name: Douse in Gloom
card.text: Douse in Gloom deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Droning Bureaucrats
card.text: {X}, {T}: Each creature with converted mana cost X can't attack or block this turn.

card.text: Whenever Dune-Brood Nephilim deals combat damage to a player, put a 1/1 colorless Sand creature token onto the battlefield for each land you control.

card.text: Each land gets +2/+2 as long as it's a creature.

card.name: Electrolyze
card.text: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players. Draw a card.
